name: Max Li
short_description: Max Li is a professional at Jane Street with an educational background from Harvard University. He has 762 followers and over 500 connections on LinkedIn, demonstrating his strong professional network.
long_description:
Max Li is currently working at Jane Street, a quantitative trading firm, and is an alumnus of Harvard University. He has built a substantial professional network with 762 followers and over 500 connections on LinkedIn.

Max has demonstrated exceptional academic achievements, including scoring 1580 on the SAT in August 2019. He was recognized as a National Merit Scholar, National AP Scholar, and QuestBridge College Prep Scholar.

He has an impressive background in debate, with numerous accomplishments including:
- Tournament of Champions Top 16 (Gold Public Forum), April 2020
- International Public Policy Forum Top 16, March 2020
- Harvard National Forensics Tournament Top 5 and #1 seed, February 2019
- Princeton Classic Top 5, December 2018
- Grand Nationals Top 16, May 2018

Additionally, Max placed 2nd individually at the Harvard Pre-Collegiate Economics Challenge in April 2019, showcasing his strong aptitude in economics.

His combination of quantitative skills, debate experience, and academic excellence has likely contributed to his current position at Jane Street, a firm known for hiring individuals with exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities.
